body: Man I want a whole detail of this series, this is too underrated

The sex scenes from the past chapter and this one are nice and all, but the story just progresses too fast and doesn't make sense. Plus if you're also technically a guy, it'd be weird feeling something in your stomache. It isn't explained how the MC has access to two sexes.
Man, this artist REALLY loves gender bender stories. Just about every one of their mangas have to do with gender bending.
